name: pkgsign
description: A CLI tool for signing and verifying npm and yarn packages.
author: Redpoint Games

scripts.signedpack: yarn build && yarn pack --filename pkgsign.tgz && node dist/index.js sign pkgsign.tgz
scripts.release: yarn test && yarn build && node util/ensure-release.js && yarn pack --filename pkgsign.tgz && node dist/index.js sign pkgsign.tgz && yarn publish pkgsign.tgz
scripts.prerelease: yarn test && yarn build && node util/ensure-prerelease.js && yarn pack --filename pkgsign.tgz && node dist/index.js sign pkgsign.tgz && yarn publish pkgsign.tgz --tag next
scripts.test: ava-ts test/*.ts && yarn build && node dist/index.js sign . && node dist/index.js verify . --allow-unsigned-packages
scripts.selfverify: yarn build && node dist/index.js sign . && node dist/index.js verify . --full --allow-unsigned-packages
